name: Eagle, Giant
languages: Giant Eagle,understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eagle makes one Beak attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the eagle can't use its Talons on another target.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Sight
special_abilities.desc: The eagle's Perception is 19 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Seabird
special_abilities.desc: The eagle can swim up to 40 feet on its turn, but it must start and end its movement either flying or on a solid surface, such as a ship or beach. If it is swimming at the end of its turn, it must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or it immediately begins to sink and suffocate. A suffocating eagle must succeed on a DC 13 STR check to fly out of the substance where it is sinking.
